scripts.deploy:all: aws s3 sync dist/ s3://policypulse3 --delete --region eu-north-1
scripts.deploy:fix-html: aws s3 cp dist/ s3://policypulse3 --recursive --exclude * --include *.html --content-type text/html --region eu-north-1
scripts.deploy:fix-jpg: aws s3 cp dist/ s3://policypulse3 --recursive --exclude * --include *.jpg --content-type image/jpg --region eu-north-1
scripts.deploy:fix-jpeg: aws s3 cp dist/ s3://policypulse3 --recursive --exclude * --include *.jpeg --content-type image/jpeg --region eu-north-1
scripts.deploy:fix-png: aws s3 cp dist/ s3://policypulse3 --recursive --exclude * --include *.png --content-type image/png --region eu-north-1
scripts.deploy:fix-js: aws s3 cp dist/ s3://policypulse3 --recursive --exclude * --include *.js --content-type application/javascript --region eu-north-1
scripts.deploy:fix-css: aws s3 cp dist/ s3://policypulse3 --recursive --exclude * --include *.css --content-type text/css --region eu-north-1
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:all && npm run deploy:fix-html && npm run deploy:fix-jpg && npm run deploy:fix-jpeg && npm run deploy:fix-png && npm run deploy:fix-js && npm run deploy:fix-css
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run deploy
